spew.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to flow out of something quickly in large quantities, or to make something flow out in this way
spew.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Factory chimneys spewed fumes out into the sky.
Brown water spewed from the tap.
spew.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to say a lot of bad or negative things very quickly
spew.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Groups like these use the Internet to spew racial hatred.
